short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate job-specific resumes from any job posting and automatically apply using your blindfold resumes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
One resume will not satisfy the demands of different jobs. With the blindfold.ai extension, you can easily create resumes that target different jobs using generative AI. Our AI helps overcome writer's block and helps build the ideal resume for the jobs you are interested in. Stop applying with the same resume to every job and increase your chances of landing your dream job.

How it works:
1. Install the blindfold.ai extension
2. Login/Signup with blindfold.ai
3. Visit any job posting page
4. Choose from an existing resume or create a targeted resume for any job
5. Save time by auto-completing job applications using your resume

This extension currently supports career sites like Google Jobs, Indeed, ZipRecruiter, Glassdoor, Monster, and more!

Blindfold also supports any job board powered by Greenhouse, Lever, or Eightfold.ai and we are constantly adding support for more sites.
